text: The Buffalo Bandits is a professional box lacrosse team in Buffalo, New York. It plays in the East Division of the National Lacrosse League. The team started in 1992 as part of the Major Indoor Lacrosse League. It won the league championship in 2008. Category:Sports in Buffalo, New York Category:National Lacrosse League Category:1992 establishments in New York (state)
title: Buffalo Bandits
